p: Sheridan conceived of the study, measured all animals and obtained breeding phenology data, and framed the final introduction and discussion. Caruso conducted the statistical analyses and designed the phenology study. Apodaca conducted the geospatial analyses of climate data. Rissler organized the project in association with National Science Foundation grant BCS 1026841 and wrote much of the first draft of this article. All authors edited the final draft of the manuscript.
